benefitSection.carbonDescription: The Giver Token platform streamlines secure, transparent carbon credit trading via blockchain, enabling global transactions without geographical limits. It connects users to the growing carbon credit market, helping reduce emissions and support certified carbon reduction projects.
benefitSection.netDescription: 'Net Zero Together' is a collaborative initiative led by Team Giver, focused on creating a sustainable future by achieving carbon neutrality. Through collective action, innovative solutions, and community engagement, we aim to minimize our environmental impact and ensure a cleaner, greener planet for future generations. Together, with Team Giver, we can lead the way to net zero emissions, empowering individuals and organizations to contribute to this critical global goal.

howTo.subHeader: Four steps to carbon credit trading on Giver
howTo.step1Description: Buyers and sellers connect directly on the Giver platform.
howTo.step2Description: Buyers pay for carbon credits with Giver Token.
howTo.step3Description: Transactions are secured and automated via Smart Contracts.
howTo.step4Description: Net Zero Together through innovation and action to strive for carbon neutrality.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.section_title_1: It Is A Critical Component Of Modern Business
about_us.mission_vision_content: Our team recognizes the issue of global warming and wants to be part of the movement towards achieving net-zero emissions. However, the current carbon credit trading system still uses paper and plastic money, which generates significant carbon emissions during production. Therefore, we have adopted blockchain technology for carbon credit trading to reduce the use of fiat currency.
about_us.partner_content: Our partners are a team of experts in waste management, both on land and at sea. They have identified ways to reduce and offset carbon dioxide emissions. The development team and our partners have therefore collaborated to create this project.

investmentFunds.title: Source of investment funds
investmentFunds.description: The funds will be used to support small-scale farmers in joining the T-Ver program to meet carbon credit standards. We will then use these funds to purchase carbon credits and sell them on our platform.

faqPage.faq_title: Presale FAQ about Fundraising and Tokens
faqPage.faq1_question: What will the funds raised be used for?
faqPage.faq1_answer: The funds will be used to purchase carbon credits from farmers and provide financial support to farmers who have not yet joined the T-VER project. This aims to promote greenhouse gas reduction and create sustainability for farming communities.
faqPage.faq2_question: Why are the tokens locked for 2 years?
faqPage.faq2_answer: Since this project requires considerable time and coordination with multiple parties, we are locking the tokens for 2 years to ensure stability in the project's execution. During this 2-year period, the tokens will remain locked, and investors will receive a 20% bonus when the tokens are unlocked.
faqPage.faq3_question: What are the special benefits for those who purchase tokens during the Pre-sale?
faqPage.faq3_answer:
Those who purchase tokens during the Pre-sale will receive several exclusive benefits, including:
 • Access to the Stake Pool 3 months before IDO investors
 • Early access to the Carbon Credit trading platform 3 months ahead of general investors
 • Their names will be recorded in the Pre-sale database, giving them faster access to additional special privileges in the future.

whitepaperPage.title: Project Overview
whitepaperPage.projectName: Project Name : Carbon Credit Trading Market on Blockchain Technology
whitepaperPage.description1: GIVER is a digital token designed to serve as the primary currency for trading carbon credits in a peer-to-peer market on the GIVER platform. All transactions utilize blockchain technology to ensure transparency and maximum efficiency. The GIVER token aims to make the carbon credit trading process more environmentally friendly by transitioning from traditional financial transactions to a fully digital system.
whitepaperPage.description2: On this platform, users can trade carbon credits using GIVER tokens through a secure, transparent, and rapid process, facilitated by Smart Contracts and GREEN tokens. GREEN tokens are created as proof of trade, minted at the beginning of each transaction and burned upon completion.

problemStatement.title: Problem Statement
problemStatement.description1: Currently, most carbon credit trading still relies on traditional processes that depend on paper-based financial systems, which are not fully aligned with the goal of reducing carbon emissions. Existing systems also face limitations, such as slow transactions, high fees, and insufficient transparency.
problemStatement.description2: The GIVER project aims to improve the speed, transparency, and eco-friendliness of carbon credit trading by utilizing GIVER and GREEN tokens on blockchain technology. This allows users to conduct peer-to-peer transactions without traditional intermediaries, streamlining the trading process and ensuring the accuracy of transactions.
problemStatement.description3: Additionally, the global average carbon footprint per person is approximately 5.3-5.5 tons of CO2 equivalent per year. Raising awareness about global warming is crucial.

useCase.title: Use Case of Giver Token
useCase.description1: The GIVER token is designed to serve as the main currency for peer-to-peer carbon credit transactions on the platform. Every transaction will use the GIVER token as the payment medium.
useCase.description2: GREEN tokens are created in the form of Smart Contracts to act as proof for each carbon credit transaction. Each GREEN token represents one carbon credit unit. Upon transaction completion, GREEN tokens are immediately burned.
useCase.description3: This approach ensures a transparent, verifiable carbon credit trading process and minimizes the risk of counterfeiting.

technologyPage.title: Technology
technologyPage.description1: We selected Binance Smart Chain (BSC) for its transaction speed, low fees, and stability—key elements for supporting peer-to-peer transactions on the GIVER platform.
technologyPage.description2: BSC also offers a comprehensive and secure ecosystem, essential for transparent and reliable transactions.

governancePage.title: Governance
governancePage.description: The GIVER platform uses a Decentralized Voting Mechanism, allowing GIVER token holders to participate in project direction decisions. GIVER holders can vote on significant matters related to platform development.

milestones.description: Conduct Pre-sale and engage relevant agencies, such as the SEC and TGO, to plan further actions.

Launch ICO for investors and those wishing to register carbon credits with TGO. Interested parties can contact Giver admin for funding consideration and assistance with TGO coordination, offering carbon credits to sell on our platform in return.
Collaborate with various exchanges to list GIVER tokens for convenient transactions.
Giver Admin sells existing carbon credits on the GIVER platform, opening carbon credit trading for pre-sale participants.
Enable small carbon credit sellers to register on GIVER’s platform, and open GIVER carbon credit trading to all users.

developmentTeam.title: Development Team
developmentTeam.description: The GIVER development team comprises blockchain technology experts, platform developers, and environmental management professionals with experience in carbon footprint reduction and carbon credit trading projects.

advisorsAndPartners.title: Advisors and Partners
advisorsAndPartners.description: GIVER collaborates with organizations specializing in both land and marine waste management. These partnerships help ensure that GIVER meets strict environmental standards and supports carbon footprint reduction across multiple industries.

marketingStrategy.title: Marketing and Project Expansion Strategy
marketingStrategy.description: Funds raised from the Pre-sale will be invested in purchasing carbon credits from small farmers and in buying land to generate carbon credits. This approach will support GIVER’s sustainable growth, adding value to the GIVER token. Additionally, we have marketing strategies focused on education and community engagement to expand the GIVER token ecosystem.

securityAndRiskManagement.title: Security and Risk Management
securityAndRiskManagement.description: The GIVER platform prioritizes user security with regular audits conducted by external experts. We also have comprehensive risk management covering regulatory compliance and cryptocurrency market volatility to reassure GIVER token holders.

legalAndCompliance.title: Legal and Compliance
legalAndCompliance.description: The GIVER project will comply with legal requirements in all countries where carbon credit trading is conducted. We will collaborate with legal and crypto regulatory experts to ensure that the project operates lawfully.

sustainableGrowth.title: Opportunities for Sustainable Growth
sustainableGrowth.description1: GIVER aims to help individuals and entities achieve Net Zero, starting with individuals. The average carbon footprint per person globally is approximately 5.3-5.5 tons of CO2 equivalent per year. Everyone can reduce or offset their footprint annually by purchasing carbon credits through the GIVER application, which will display their offset status transparently.
sustainableGrowth.description2: Once this initiative reaches a significant level, it will foster connections, influencing individual and group participation in various activities. Events and organizations requiring participation will recognize and prioritize climate awareness, making it easier to achieve Net Zero. To support this, GIVER plans to develop an application for future user activities.

steps.description: Pre-sale and engagement with relevant regulatory bodies (e.g., SEC, TGO) to plan operations.
Giver contacts various exchanges to list the token, providing convenience for Giver token buyers.
ICO launch; those interested in registering to sell carbon credits through TGO can contact Giver Admin.
Giver admin sells carbon credits on the platform; the platform opens for pre-sale participants.
The platform opens for all sellers to register and sell their carbon credits on the Giver platform.
